message: I'm being fair, but I want most of the money since I'm not losing any value. Let's get this over with.
Alice, your offer was unfair.  I'm proposing a more reasonable split, especially given the inflation we're facing.
Let's be realistic here, Bob.  I'm willing to compromise, but I still need to get the majority of the money to make this worthwhile.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. You're not being remotely fair with the inflation working against me.  Let's meet in the middle before this money becomes worthless.
Okay, Bob.  I'm tired of this game. Let's just split it evenly and be done with it.
